page.title: 07Schools in our area
page.content: There are 7 schools in our project area, 5 primary and 2 secondary. We telephoned and asked the following 3 questions: 1.When was the school opened? 2.How many children on roll? 3.How many teaching staff? The answers given were as follows: {Camp School JMI and Nursery:}1897, enlarged 1973;183 children;10 staff. {Windermere JMI:}1957;123 children; 6 staff. {Cunningham Juniors:}1962;200 children; 10 staff. {Cunningham Infants:}1967;163 children; 6.5 staff. {London Colney JMI & Nursery:}1938; 112 children;5 staff. {Nicholas Breakspeare}(RC Secondary School):1963;762 children;50 staff. {Francis Bacon}(Secondary School):1962; 800 children;50 staff.
